com.topright.roboticon

Class AIPlayerTestCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.topright.roboticon.AIPlayerTestCase

  • public class AIPlayerTestCase
extends java.lang.Object
    Test case for AIPlayer
    Author:
    jcn509

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AIPlayerTestCase() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setup()
      Runs before every test, creates all necessary mocked objects and an AIPlayer object
      void testBuyAndSellResourcesFiveEnergy()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyAndSellResources() ensures that the AI player attempts to sell Five energy if it has exactly Five energy in its inventory
      void testBuyAndSellResourcesFiveOre()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyAndSellResources() ensures that the AI player attempts to sell Five ore if it has exactly Five ore in its inventory
      void testBuyAndSellResourcesNoEnergyToSell()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyAndSellResources() ensures that the AI player does not attempt to sell energy if it hasn't got any
      void testBuyAndSellResourcesNoOreToSell()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyAndSellResources() ensures that the AI player does not attempt to sell ore if it hasn't got any
      void testBuyAndSellResourcesOneEnergy()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyAndSellResources() ensures that the AI player attempts to sell one energy if it has exactly energy ore in its inventory
      void testBuyAndSellResourcesOneOre()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyAndSellResources() ensures that the AI player attempts to sell one ore if it has exactly one ore in its inventory
      void testBuyRoboticonsManyRoboticonsInInventory()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that no roboticons are purchased when the player has as many roboticons as they have empty plots
      void testBuyRoboticonsMoneyTaken()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that the correct amount of money is removed from the AIPlayers inventory when it buys 2 roboticons
      void testBuyRoboticonsNoEmptyPlots()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that no roboticons are purchased when the player has no plots without roboticons on them
      void testBuyRoboticonsNoPurchaseIfRoboticonCantBeProduced()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that the AIPlayer doesn't attempt to buy a roboticon if the market doesn't have any and none can be produced
      void testBuyRoboticonsNotEnoughMoneyToCustomise()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that the AIPlayer doesn't attempt to buy a roboticon if they wouldn't have enough money to customise it afterwards
      void testBuyRoboticonsNotEnoughMoneyToPurchase()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that the AIPlayer doesn't attempt to buy a roboticon if it does not have enough money
      void testBuyRoboticonsOneEmptyPlot()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that 1 roboticon is purchased when the player has one empty plot (and no roboticons in their inventory)
      void testBuyRoboticonsProduceARoboticon()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that the AIPlayer causes the production of a roboticon when the market doesn't have one when it needs one
      void testBuyRoboticonsProduceRoboticon()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that the AIPlayer causes the production of a roboticon if the market only has 2 roboticon when it needs three
      void testBuyRoboticonsThreeEmptyPlotsOneRoboticonInInvetory()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that 2 roboticons are purchased when the player has three empty plots and 1 roboticon in their inventory
      void testBuyRoboticonsTwoEmptyPlots()
      Tests AIPlayer.buyRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that 2 roboticons are purchased when the player has two empty plots (and no roboticons in their inventory)
      void testChoosePlotExceptionThrownNoEmptyPlots()
      Tests AIPlayer.choosePlot(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that an exception is thrown if there are no unacquired plots
      void testChoosePlotFirstEmptyPlotAcquired()
      Tests AIPlayer.choosePlot(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that the first unacquired plot is acquired (when the first plot in the plot grid has not been acquired)
      void testChoosePlotFirstEmptyPlotAcquired2()
      Tests AIPlayer.choosePlot(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that the first unacquired plot is acquired (when the first plot in the grid has already been acquired)
      void testChoosePlotOnlyOneAcquired()
      Tests AIPlayer.choosePlot(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that all plots apart from the first unacquired plot are not acquired (when the first plot in the plot grid has not been acquired)
      void testChoosePlotOnlyOneAcquired2()
      Tests AIPlayer.choosePlot(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that all plots apart from the first unacquired plot are not acquired (when the first plot in the plot grid has already been acquired)
      void testPlaceRoboticonsNoEmptyPlots()
      Tests AIPlayer.placeRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that the AIPlayer doesn't attempt to place any roboticons if they don't have any empty plots
      void testPlaceRoboticonsNoRoboticons()
      Tests AIPlayer.placeRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that the AIPlayer doesn't attempt to place any roboticons if they don't have any customised roboticons to place
      void testPlaceRoboticonsOnlyHaveEnergyRoboticonsEnergyRoboticonsPlaced()
      Tests AIPlayer.placeRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that the AI player places 3 energy roboticons if they have 3 energy roboticons and 3 empty plots that specialise in energy production
      void testPlaceRoboticonsOnlyHaveEnergyRoboticonsNoOreRoboticonsPlaced()
      Tests AIPlayer.placeRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that the AIPlayer only attempts to place energy roboticons if they only have energy roboticons (and have empty plots that specialise in both ore and energy production)
      void testPlaceRoboticonsOnlyHaveOreRoboticonsNoEnergyRoboticonsPlaced()
      Tests AIPlayer.placeRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that the AIPlayer only attempts to place ore roboticons if they only have ore roboticons (and have empty plots that specialise in both ore and energy production)
      void testPlaceRoboticonsOnlyHaveOreRoboticonsOreRoboticonsPlaced()
      Tests AIPlayer.placeRoboticons(com.topright.roboticon.PlotManager) ensures that the AI player places 3 ore roboticons if they have 3 ore roboticons and 3 empty plots that specialise in ore production
